Entries.Description: Improvements have been made to the Lambda publish dialog to differentiate between creating a new function and publishing to an existing function. This fixes an issue where typing a function name could cause the function's configuration to be overwritten with a different function's configuration.
Switched to signed version of the underlying cli tool used for zipping Lambda function deployment bundles
AWS Toolkit for Visual Studio is now generally available for Arm64 Visual Studio
The Getting Started experience has been improved, making it easier to add IAM Identity Center authentication to the AWS Toolkit for Visual Studio.
